case.title: Do you ever miss those extended foreplays????? Are you in NYC or LI? - m4w - 40 (NYC)
case.text: Do you crave long, extended foreplays? Do you miss them? Do you miss gentle hugging, touching, caressing, kissing, petting, smooching, snuggling, necking, nibbling, gentle biting, whiffing, sniffing, licking, suckling, finger-play, foreplay? Well, write to me and see if I can help you. I am 42, M, DDF, not expecting anything in return. This can be one time deal or recurring. You be appropriate body type, DDF, discrete and interesting.
